previous.excerpt: GitWrapped allows you to view the statistics of your Github profile over the years, the amount of lines you wrote, how many pull requests you closed and more! Compare stats with your friends and show off on social media! #GitWrapped #Wrapped #Github2020
previous.title: GitWrapped - View/Share how you contributed to Github over the years

localize.description: GitWrased允许你查看这些年来你的Github个人资料的统计数据，你写了多少行，你完成了多少拉请求等等！与您的朋友比较统计数据并在社交媒体上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享这些年来您是如何为Github做出贡献的

localize.description: GitWrased允許你查看這些年來你的Github個人資料的統計數據，你寫了多少行，你完成了多少拉請求等等！與您的朋友比較統計數據並在社交媒體上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享這些年來您是如何爲Github做出貢獻的

next.excerpt: Ship faster and improve team satisfaction with engineering analytics powered by your Github data. -- → Visualize the entire delivery process from commit to deploy → Highlight bottlenecks like code review → Spot issues like feature delays and team burnout.
next.title: Haystack - Ship faster and improve dev happiness

localize.description: 借助由您的Github数据提供支持的工程分析，加快发货速度并提高团队满意度。--→可视化整个交付过程，从提交到部署，→突出瓶颈(如代码审查)，→发现问题(如功能延迟和团队倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快发货速度，提高开发人员幸福感

localize.description: 藉助由您的Github數據提供支持的工程分析，加快發貨速度並提高團隊滿意度。--→可視化整個交付過程，從提交到部署，→突出瓶頸(如代碼審查)，→發現問題(如功能延遲和團隊倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快發貨速度，提高開發人員幸福感
